b00:
“I won't lose. I will endure this──”
　Trying not to focus on the sensation, Noel closes her legs tight, and tries to think about her mentor's and family's faces.

But still, her lower lips pulses with desire at every possibility, at which every instance, her thoughts get overwritten with lustful images.
　It took Noel nearly an hour to regain her peace of mind.

Noel's fingers, coated in her own juice mixed in with the monsters' aphrodisiac, makes lewd squelching sounds as she repeatedly pushes herself to climax.
　... After a while, Noel found herself to have blacked out. Her crotch is widely spread out, her underwear also loose, not properly covering her privates.
“I-I, in this state, in a place like this──”

Noel's cheeks flush bright red, frantically slips her soaked underwear on and curls herself into a ball.
(If anyone had been watching me in that state──)
　Her cheeks continue to burn as red as a ripe apple for a while longer, deeply regretting her own actions of indulging in self-pleasure.

d_00:
First, you select a recipe.
Let's start from bread; the basics of basics.
If you stand at the kitchen, all of the recipes you know will show up. Select bread, and get ready to start cooking.
d_02: <W2/>The box on the top left-hand corner lists all the ingredients you need for this dish.
d_03: The box on the top left-hand corner lists all the ingredients you need for this dish.
Move your cursor with <key ta/> and select this line.
d_04:
Right now, you have some wheat, nice.
Use <key submit/> to add in two of them.
n_05: Is it fine to add in up to five of these?
d_06: Are you going to eat all that? It's embarassing to have a greedy sister like you.
n_07: N-No, I'm just asking...!
d_08: You'll also need some water to make bread. Add it in the same way.
d_10: You will see an image of the finished product in the box below.
This fork and knife symbol represents the value of the dish. It indicates how much this food can fill your stomach.
The more ingredients you put in, the more this value increases.
It's in Noel's best interests to eat until you're full, so remember to watch your appetite.
However, some ingredients may have special status effects when eaten.
The effects of wheat has to do with neutrality of mana; In other words, how easy it is to recover scattered mana after a mana burst.
If the neutrality is low, it could lead to an outcome where a monster absorbs all the scattered mana and becomes huge.
d_11: How much of the effects you get depends on the nutrition values (Pow) showed on the right side.
If you add in a lot of ingredients, the value of the food will go up as well, but the nutrition values will accordingly be less.
In short, don't overeat, and appreciate the food's flavour.
d_12:
That's been quite a while.
Move your cursor down to that button and let's start cooking.

v_01: However, the higher the danger level is, the stronger the monsters will be, and there will be more of them.
They can suddenly attack you even if you don't pluck the mana plants... They can wreak havoc and will really become a problem.
v_02: That's why, you should come back home at a reasonable time. Edging just enough to satisfy our customers~!

v_04: Yes, yes~ As a rule of thumb, you should be careful when night falls or fog thickens.
v_05: Also, one more important point! When the danger level is low, you can warp from a bench to another one you have been to before!
v_06: If the danger level rises, you have to move on your own, but remember that <c blue>you can always return home from any bench<c>~

x_00: There are other ways to use spells than just blasting it out.
<c red>After casting a spell, once you evade or attack, <c>you can move or jump while mana is still in your cane.
Then you punch a monster, the energy of spell is directly delivered to the enemy at close range!
The technique is called <c blue>Shotgun<c>. Try it.
However, enemies strikes you while you are holding mana, it is easy for the mana to dissipate.
When the spell is not fully charged ─until it is not ready to fire─ the power of Shotgun is almost nonexistent.
It's a high-risk, high-reward technique for the reason that is powerful but you have to get close to the enemies.

p_04: Alice was beginning to get very tired of sitting by her sister on the bank, and of having nothing to do: once or twice she had peeped into the book her sister was reading,
but it had no pictures or conversations in it, 'and what is the use of a book,' thought Alice 'without pictures or conversations?'
p_05: So she was considering in her own mind as well as she could, for the hot day made her feel very sleepy and stupid, whether the pleasure of making a daisy-chain would be worth the trouble of getting up and picking the daisies─
when suddenly a White Rabbit with pink eyes ran close by her.
p_06: There was nothing so very remarkable in that; nor did Alice think it so very much out of the way to hear the Rabbit say to itself, “Oh dear! Oh dear! I shall be late!” but when the Rabbit actually took a watch out of its waistcoat-pocket, and looked at it, and then hurried on─

Alice started to her feet, for it flashed across her mind that she had never before seen a rabbit with either a waistcoat-pocket, or a watch to take out of it, and burning with curiosity, she ran across the field after it,
and fortunately was just in time to see it pop down a large rabbit-hole under the hedge.
p_07: However, this bottle was not marked “poison,” so Alice ventured to taste it, and finding it very nice, (it had, in fact, a sort of mixed flavour of cherry-tart, custard, pine-apple, roast turkey, toffee, and hot buttered toast,) she very soon finished it off.
And so it was indeed: she was now only ten inches high, and her face brightened up at the thought that she was now the right size for going through the little door into that lovely garden.
p_08: “He took me for his housemaid,” she said to herself as she ran. “How surprised he’ll be when he finds out who I am! But I’d better take him his fan and gloves—that is, if I can find them.”

As she said this, she came upon a neat little house, on the door of which was a bright brass plate with the name
“W. RABBIT,” engraved upon it. She went in without knocking, and hurried upstairs.
p_09: “It was much pleasanter at home,” thought poor Alice, “when one wasn’t always growing larger and smaller, and being ordered about by mice and rabbits. I almost wish I hadn’t gone down that rabbit-hole—and yet—and yet—it’s rather curious, you know, this sort of life!

I do wonder what can have happened to me! When I used to read fairy-tales, I fancied that kind of thing never happened, and now here I am in the middle of one! There ought to be a book written about me, that there ought! And when I grow up, I’ll write one—but I’m grown up now,”
She added in a sorrowful tone; “at least there’s no room to grow up any more here.”
p_09_2: “Off with her head!” the Queen shouted at the top of her voice. Nobody moved.
“Who cares for you?” said Alice, who had grown to her full size by this time. “You’re nothing but a pack of cards!”
At this the whole pack rose up into the air, and came flying down upon her: she gave a little scream, half of fright and half of anger, and tried to beat them off─
And found herself lying on the bank, with her head in the lap of her sister, who was gently brushing away some dead leaves that had fluttered down from the trees upon her face.

“Wake up, Alice dear!” said her sister;
“Why, what a long sleep you’ve had!”

“Oh, I’ve had such a curious dream!” said Alice, and she told her sister, as well as she could remember them, all these strange Adventures of hers that you have just been reading about; and when she had finished, her sister kissed her.
And said, “It was a curious dream, dear, certainly: but now run in to your tea; it’s getting late.”
So Alice got up and ran off, thinking while she ran, as well she might, what a wonderful dream it had been.

b00:
“Ouch...”
　Noel presses down on the swollen skin.
　Noel was attacked by monsters and injured until she could
barely stand.
　Blue-black bruises and blotched cuts covering Noel's thin frames throb with immense pain - as if they were conveying the horrors of the battle.

Every time she fought back the pain, she instinctively remembered an image of the huge black body of a monster closing in on her.
Noel gulped in fear.
“If I'd been attacked a little more, I'd have──”
　It brought back memories of Noel being defeated by a horde of monsters and having her mana drained so much that not a single drop was left.

It hurt, it was dreadfully painful that her cries for help were so weak they would never reach anyone.
(I don't want to be forced to go through that morbid experience again.)

──
As she completes the simple treatments, her fears gradually subside.
“It's okay, I can do this──”

(The youngest and proudest daughter of the Cornehl family; the most talented girl in the school,
I don't think I'll ever be sufficiently qualified to be referred to by that name, but I guess I can at least pretend to be confident.)
The staff shimmers a faint jade color, as if in response to Noel's heart.

v_04: If I get some boxes, play with the monsters a bit more without opening them, and only open all boxes once I have collected a lot~
n_05: You'll get a lot of good quality items...?
v_06: Correct! Like how you'd feel better if you hold it in a lot before you let it all out~!
n_07: Then, if I store a lot of boxes at home, take them with me and increase the danger level...!
v_08:
Ah~ you can't do that.
When you get home, all the boxes will automatically be opened.
But if Noel faints, things are even worse. The danger level gets reset to zero, and all the boxes will then open.
v_09: However, you won't lose any item in your bag even if you faint, so it might be a wiser choice to open your boxes if you are about to lose~.

n_00: There are a lot of small monsters around here... These small creatures are less vulnerable to magic, so no attacks will work on them.
n_01: The ceiling is also full of them... I have to be careful not to jump too high.
n_02: If I want to stay in the air for a long time or get somewhere far, I can <c blue>evade in the air<c> to glide smoothly.

p_00: Mm.. hup.
p_01: I'm going to cast some magic on Noel-san, so please try to block it.
n_02: I'll try...!
p_03: Let's start with practice drills for shields.
<key lsh/><c red>While your shield is active, you can protect yourself from toxic gases.
p_04: Try to make it  so that you don't inhale the gas from my spell. Then, let's begin!

n_00: I met some monsters on the way... and, well.. you know. I messed up just a little bit.
p_00: Could it be... you lost?
n_01: Well, a little... but I got released before it became serious, and the mana that got sucked away wasn't really...
p_02: ...You must have been scared, weren't you? Here's some warm tea。
It helps slowly restore mana, and also helps with gluttocruorin loss.
n_03: ...Delicious... H-hic... it's... delicious...
p_04: There, there. You made it back safely, and you managed to complete your errand.
You've completed everything you had to do.
p_05: That must have been painful── Are you feeling better now? Still in any pain?
n_06: Hic... it's fine, I'm okay now.
p_07: Is it fine if I examine you a bit just to be sure? Show me your chest.
p_08: Your heartbeat is... a little erratic, but it's still in the normal range.
But... while not serious, there are symptoms of level three gluttocruorin loss...
p_09: Let's have a sit-down session until the medicinal properties of the tea takes effect.
n_10: Then... let's go back to my room. Is it physics today? Or is it math?
p_11: No, we'll stay here today... Tada!

p_01: Are you all right? It seems like you inhaled a lot of gas and fainted.
n_02: I-I'm sorry. I'll do it better next time...
p_03: If you put up your shield for a long time, it will glow red and its strength will drop.
But, <c red>as long as it will not receive physical damage, it will not break.<c> So, you can put the shield on until the gas subsides.
p_04: ...Well then, once again! This time, be careful not to breathe in the gas!

n_00: 'What are you fighting for'...
n_01: When I was young, I was playing in the forest with nee-sama when I got bored of the usual route...
Nee-sama tried to stop me, but I persuaded her to go and in the end we went a little deeper into the forest.
n_02: There, I accidentally pulled out a mana plant, and... we were suddenly attacked by a group of monsters.
n_03: I couldn't stand up because I was too scared that my knees dropped dead on the spot, but nee-sama was so quick with her spells─
She used her magic to wipe out the entire monster pack.
n_04: It was... so cool.
That's why, I will become stronger, then, I'll make this world a better place...
n_05: ─! No... Don't come near... <m scary>Someone... No....!

n_00: I ran into some monsters on the way, but I managed to defeat them somehow.
p_01:
<m ple>You battled!?
<m>You promised you wouldn't go anywhere dangerous, didn't you.
n_02: I-I'm sorry... there was one monster on the way back, and it didn't look like I could get around it.
p_03: ...You are one excellent student, but there's still the fact of two weeks ago.
That's why I'm planning to check on you today, to judge if you can use magic normally. Are you in any pain?
n_04: I'm all right; I didn't feel any pain, even when I was filling the staff with mana.
p_05: I still need to examine you, just in case. Show me your chest.
n_06: W-Well then... if you'll excuse me.
p_07: Your heartbeat... is normal. There doesn't seem to be any magic mass swellings in your body. Try taking a deep breath.
p_09: That's good enough. Thank you, Noel.
n_10:
Thank you very much.
...That reminds me, Ixia-san told me that she gave you the spell.
p_11:
Ah, yes, I've received it.
But before we get to the practical training─
Let's get some classrom matters out of the way. I actually got something special for you today─
p_12:
<m ple>Tada!
We're going to study history with this!

x_00: Y-You are buying here too...? Ehe, you are a bad girl.
n_01: Bad girl?
x_02: This shop here, there's a rumor that it's run by the witch who got expelled from the village.
If I told mom or dad that I plan to come here, I would be scolded by them. So that's why I woke up early and secretly came here.
The path and bridge overgrown with thorns... the place with a lot of mushrooms on the way here... isn't it scary?
There's also this story that someone saw a ghost disappearing into the earth around there too, you know?
n_03: So our house has those urban stories spreading...
n_04: ...But, actually yesterday, I did felt like something was there.
x_04: So that's true! I-If I buy the talismans from here, will the ghosts get mad and come out?
n_05: Don't you buy the talismans to avoid the ghosts...?

n_00: Do you have any tips on gathering materials?
v_01: Wow~, are you going to gather materials for me again? You really are a good girl, <m joy>Noel There~ There~
n_02: Wah, there are customers here...
v_03: You know that the places where you can collect wood, gems and other resources will be restored when you come back home, right?
But you see, there are certain quality grades of materials, and it's easier to <c red>get higher qualities when Noel is more popular with the monsters~
n_04: Popular, huh...
v_05: That's correct. You should find a mana-meter in your bag, right? That shows the danger level of the area you are in.
As Noel plays with the monsters, mana that has nowhere else to go will...
v_06: <m joy>become the heat rising up~!<m> The quality of the material you will find will be affected by that heat too~!
n_06: Y-You don't really need to use such an obscene analogy every time...
v_07: You're such a naive girl~.

n_00: I want to try cooking! Can I?
d_01: Nope.
n_02: No way!
d_03: You see, I'm deeply attached to this kitchen. When I have a good day, I sometimes buy good seasonings.
You know what I mean. You burn these, and you're seriously no longer my sister.
n_04: Uuuuu...
d_05: Also, even though I still have a stock of ingredients that I bought from town, I want to use them...
That's why if Noel really wants to do cooking, then use your own ingredients.
n_06: I understand. I'm good at gathering.
d_07: That, and the cookwares. Do not ever lay your fingers on Josephine.
d_09: Isn't she cute? It's a pan of love, soaked in oil. How many years do you think it took to get to this state?
n_10: <think>Now that you mention it, I think you've been using this since you graduated?...
d_11: That's why I want Noel to cook with only this tiny pot for a while.
n_12: Wow, you're giving it to me? Thank you so much!
d_13: Well, I guess I'll have you make the toast I was going to make now.
I'll give you the ingredients just for today, but as I've said before, next time make sure you only use what you have gathered yourself.
d_14: ...I mean, we have already talked about this before, no?
I'll also give you some of the ingredients we have at home this time, but the finished sandwich will become my snack, so.

d_00: Eating food will give you pretty good buffs during your adventure. Automatic HP recovery, or a huge increase in attack power...
So, unless Noel is going off to rut with the monsters, you better eat some food.
n_01: As if I'd ever go off like that!
d_02: However, the potency and effective time of the food is affected by the quality and quantity of ingredients used to make them.
Each time Noel fights a monster, the effective time decreases. In that regard, coming home when you feel hungry might be safer.
n_03: Can you make a lunchbox or something so I can eat outside?
d_04: Food can only be eaten at home unless if you have a 'Lunch box'.
d_05: The food will become bad as soon as it touches the mana mist, you see. And lunch boxes are too expensive for us!
d_06: Well, even though it's one of the items nee-sama sells, it's still a product.
So if you want to eat out, you better work hard to afford yourself a lunch box.

d_00: By now, you should've known that each ingredient can have various benefits when cooked and eaten.
n_01: If I make and eat a lot of food with a variety of effects, will I become the very best...?
d_02: That depends on your cooking skills. Though, don't eat too much - be very careful on that.
If you try to eat a high value dish when you are already full, only a little will actually go down your stomach.
That means the potency of the dish is greatly reduced.
n_03:
Can't I just store the leftovers?
Or maybe, combine them with other dishes...
d_04: ......If I were to be our father, I'd disown you for being so disgraceful already.
d_05: By the way, <c blue> the effect of all food eaten when you are hungry will be 1.5 times greater</c>.
Food tastes a lot better when you are hungry, after all.
Because of that, your first meal of the day should be a special one made with high-grade ingredients.

b20_2:
"Of course...I understand. Take your time.",
her sister replied.
After thoroughly washing her entire body,
Noel returned to her room.

b17_2:
Feeling a mixture of embarrassment and joy,
Noel closed her eyes.

이번에는 샌드위치를 골라.
d_01:
<W2>샌드위치는 빵이
2개 필요해.
하지만 같은 것을 일일이
만드는 것은 귀찮지?

레시피에 다른 요리가 포함되었을
때 한번이라도 만든 적이 있다면
이 화면에서 같이 만들 수 있어.

빵에 커서를 올려놓고,
<key a/>를 눌러서
'맡긴다'를 선택해.
d_03:
<W2>맡길 때의 메뉴에서는
대략 어느 정도의 품질로
만들고 싶은지 선택할 수 있어.
좋아하는 스타일을 골라.
d_04:
방금 만든 빵과 같이
같은 재료로 빵을 만든다…….
이걸로 빵 준비는 OK.
d_05:
두 번째 행은
'채소' 또는 '과일'을
2~4개 넣는다, 라는 뜻이야.

채소와 과일을
섞어도 상관은 없지만
필요량(2)보다 많이 넣으면
특수 효과가 희미해진다는
점은 잊지 마.
d_06:
재료가 다 모였다면 완성이야.
아래 박스의 '조리 시작'을 선택해.
d_07:
OK.
코스트도 괜찮네.
이 정도 양이라면
저녁까지 괜찮겠네.

요리 방법은 알겠어?
뭐, 배우기보다는 익숙해지라는 걸로.

b00:
'질 수 없어. 이런건 참아내겠어──'
의식하지 않도록 노엘은 필사적으로 다리를 모으고
선생님과 가족들의 얼굴을 떠올리려 했습니다.
하지만, 노엘의 비부는 사사건건 탐내듯
쑤셔오며, 그럴 때마다 사고가 외설스러운
상상으로 덮어쓰여버립니다.

…노엘이 평정심을 되찾은 것은
약 한 시간쯤 지난 후였습니다.

음독과 애액이 손가락에 얽혀 끈적하게
외설스러운 소리를 내며 몇 번이고
노엘을 절정으로 이끕니다.
……잠시 후, 노엘은 속옷도 제대로
입지 않은 채 벤치 위에서 크게 가랑이를
벌리고 정신을 잃고 있었음을 깨닫습니다.
'ㄴ 나, 이런 곳에서 이런 꼴로──'

볼에 홍조를 띄운 채 급하게 젖은 속옷에
발을 넣으며 몸을 작게 말았습니다.
이런 상스러운 모습을 만약 누군가가
봤을 거라고 생각하면──.
노엘은 잠시동안 볼을 딸기처럼
새빨갛게 물들인 채 쾌락에 빠져있던
자신의 행동을 후회했습니다.

d_00:
일단 레시피를 골라.
기본중의 기본, 빵부터 만들자.

부엌에 서면, 노엘이 알고 있는
레시피의 목록이 표시될 거야.
d_02:
<W2/>왼쪽 위의 박스에
이 요리에 필요한
재료의 목록이 표시될 거야.
d_03:
맨 윗줄에는

<key ta/>으로 커서를 움직여서
이 행으로 이동시켜 봐.
d_04:

n_05: 5개까지 넣어도 괜찮나요?

d_10:
아래쪽 박스에 완성품의
이미지가 뜰 거야.

이 포크 마크는
요리의 코스트야.
얼마나 배가 불러질 지를
나타내는 거야.

노엘이 배부를 때까지 먹는
편이 이득이니까 자신의
위장과 상의해서 코스트를
조정하면 돼.

식재료에 의해 먹는 것으로
특수한 효과를 얻을 수
있는 경우가 있어.

밀의 효과는 마력의 중립성…
즉, 마술이 작렬한 후에
비산하는 마력의
회수 용이성에 관여해.

중립성이 낮으면
마술로 공격했는데 그것을
적이 회수해서 단숨에 거대화,
같은 일도 일어날 수 있어.
d_11:
이 효과를 얼마나 얻을 수
있을지는 재료의 행 우측에 있는

재료를 필요량(지금은 2)보다
더 넣으면 전체 코스트는 높아지고
영향도는 그만큼 낮아져.

요점은 폭식하지 말고
식재료의 맛을 음미하며
먹으라는 거야.

그리고 중요한 거니까

한 번이라도 밖에서 전투를 하면

전부 '상한 요리'로 변해.

그걸 먹는다고 해서
효과를 얻을 수는 없으니
만든 요리는 창고에 넣거나
먹고 출발해.

언니가 읽는 책을 한두 번 힐끗거리긴 했지만,

책에는 그림도 대화도 보이지 않았어요. 앨리스는 속으로 생각했어요.
'그림도 대화도 없는 책이 도대체 무슨 재미야?'
p_05:
그래서 앨리스는 데이지로 꽃다발을 만들까 했지만
꽃을 꺾으러 다니는 것이 귀찮게 느껴졌어요.

그런 생각을 하다보니,
갑자기 흰 토끼 한 마리가 앨리스 옆을 지나갔어요.
p_06:
그거야 딱히 특별한 일은 아니었어요.
'이런! 지각하고 말 거야!' 하고 중얼거리는
소리를 듣고서도 앨리스는 그다지 이상하다고 생각하지 않았어요.

하지만 토끼가 코트 주머니에서 시계를 꺼내 쳐다보고 달려가는
모습을 보자 앨리스도 자리에서 일어날 수밖에 없었어요.

호기심이 솟구친 앨리스는 토끼의 뒤를 쫓아 달리기 시작했어요.
다행히도 토끼가 울타리 아래의 커다란 굴 안으로 뛰어드는 모습이 보였어요.
p_07:
하지만 이 병에는 "독성"이라는 표시가 없었기에 앨리스는
용기를 내어 병의 내용물을 맛보았어요.
그리고 어찌나 맛있었는지 눈 깜짝할 새 그 병을 다 비웠어요.

그리고, 실제로 그녀의 키는 30센치 정도가 되었고,
작은 문을 통과해 예쁜 정원으로 들어가기에
딱 좋은 크기가 되었다는 생각에 앨리스의 얼굴이 환해졌어요.
p_08:
──
"내가 자기 하녀인 줄 아나 봐." 앨리스는 달리며 중얼거렸어요.
"내가 누군지 알면 얼마나 놀랄까! 하지만 일단은 토끼에게 부채와 장갑을
가져다주는 것이 좋겠어. 찾을 수 있다면."

그 말이 끝나기 무섭게 그녀는 아담한 집에 다다랐어요.
문 위에는 "흰 토끼"라고 새겨진 번뜩이는 놋쇠 문패가 달려있었어요.

앨리스는 혹시라도 진짜 메리 앤을 만나 부채와 장갑을 찾기도 전에
쫓겨날까봐 문도 두드리지 않고 들어가 서둘러 위층으로 향했어요.
p_09:
'집에 있을 때가 훨씬 좋았어. 커졌다가 작아졌다가 하지도 않고,
쥐나 토끼가 나에게 이래라저래라 하지도 않았으니까.
토끼굴로 들어오는게 아니었어.

그래도, 이렇게 사는 게 더 재미있기도 해! 동화를 읽었을 때
그런 일은 일어나지 않을 거라고 생각했는데,
이젠 내가 그 한가운데에 있어!

나에 대한 책이 있어야 해! 내가 크면 꼭 한 권 쓸 거야.
하지만 난 지금도 이렇게나 자랐어.'
'적어도 여기서 더 이상 자라지 못할 정도로.'
p_09_2: "입 닥쳐!" 얼굴이 붉으락푸르락해서는 여왕이 외쳤어요.
"싫어요!" 앨리스가 대들었어요.
"저 년의 목을 쳐라!" 여왕이 소리질렀지만, 누구도 움직이지 않았어요.

"누가 당신 말에 신경이나 쓴대요?" 앨리스가 말했어요.
이제 앨리스는 온전히 제 키로 돌아와 있었어요.
"고작 종이 카드 주제에!"

이 말에 카드들이 공중으로 날아오르더니 앨리스 위로 쏟아져 내렸어요.
겁도 나고 화도 나서 앨리스는 작은 비명을 지르며 카드를 쳐내려다
자신이 언니의 무릎을 베고 강둑에 누워 있다는 것을 깨달았어요.
"일어나, 앨리스! 무슨 잠을 그렇게 처자니!" 언니가 말했어요.

"아, 정말 이상한 꿈을 꿨어!" 앨리스는 언니에게 방금 여러분이 읽은
이상한 모험의 이야기를 기억나는 대로 들려주었어요.

이야기를 마치자 언니가 앨리스에게 입을 맞추며 말했어요.
"정말 이상한 꿈이구나. 하지만 이제 차를 마시러 가야해. 늦겠어."

앨리스는 일어나 달리기 시작했어요. 그리고 생각했어요.
정말 굉장한 꿈이었다고.
n_11:
이건…… 역사서인가요?
왠지 어느 이야기건 간에
너무 엉뚱한 것 같아서…….
p_12:
그러게…. 어쩌면
어른들이 아이들에게 읽어주기
위한 이야기일지도.
p_12_2:
그래도, 옛날 사람들도
상상력이 풍부했다는 것에
감탄하게 되죠.
n_13:
도중에 나온
'토끼'나 '고양이'는
드워프같은 건가요?
p_14:
으음, 아마 아니지 않을까?
드워프가 지하에 사는
종족이라고는 하지만……

어느 쪽이냐고 하면
여기의 소동물은──
우리 수인의 조상에
가까울 거야.
n_15: 조상…….
p_16:
탐굴로 구문명의 생명의 흔적이
발견되는 일은 드물다──
고 하기보다는 거의 없지만.

적어도 '고양이'라는 가축이
일찍이 인간들에게 있어서
가장 친근한 파트너였다,
는 것은 확실시되고 있지만.
p_16_2:
그래 그래, 분명 네 할머니께서도
'내게는 고양이의 피가 흐르고 있다'
고 하셨어.

그러니까, 노엘 양의 머리의 돌기도
할머니에게서 유전된
고양이에게서 나온 걸지도 몰라.
n_17:
……저, 이거 싫어요.
모자랑 머리가 스치면 가렵고,
게다가 친구들도 가족들도
저만 따돌려서──

나는 언니와 오빠랑은 달라.
코르넬 가의 이분자야──
라고 생각하게 돼서.

n_00:
프리뮬라 선생님,
오늘도 와 주셔서
감사합니다.
마을에서 꽤 먼데도
지팡이랑 고문서까지…….
p_00:
귀엽고 소중한 학생이
뒤떨어지면 안되니까요.
이 정도는 아무것도 아니에요.
p_01:
……저기, 노엘 양.
노엘 양은 자라서
이루고 싶은 목표나
꿈이 있나요?
n_02: 목표는……

어엿한 마술사가 돼서……
여러 곳을 여행하고,
누군가에게 있어서
영웅이 된다거나……
n_03:
아, 아뇨.
왠지 부끄러운 소리를
하는 것 같아.
죄송해요. 동화같아서
현실미가 없었죠.
p_03:
아니요.
부끄러울 것 없어요.
p_04:
확실히 너는 동화속의
공주님 같은 게 아니야.
p_05:
네. 괜찮아요.
노엘 양이라면 분명
이룰 수 있을 거야.
내가 기대하는
우수한 학생이니까.
n_06: 고마워요.
n_07:
……프리뮬라 선생님의
꿈이 무엇인지
물어봐도 괜찮을까요?
p_07:
………이전의 저를 만나서
왜 기억의 인계를 하지 않은 거냐며
때리는 정도는 하고 싶어요.
p_09:
우리 순수한 수인의
각 개체의 수명은 무척 짧아서──

정기적으로 '천변 시설'에서
기억의 인계를 포함한
'전생'을 함으로써
목숨을 부지하고 있다,
는 것은 알고 있지?
n_10: 네.
p_11:
개체로서는 완전한 타인이기에
어린 클론의 개체의 뇌에
전두엽과 기억 데이터를 덮어쓰는
것으로 나── '프리뮬라'는
계속 존재할 수 있는 거야.

……하지만, 그것은
인계를 하지 않은 3개체 전의
'프리뮬라'는 이미
죽었다는 것이 되잖아?
n_12:
…클론을 준비할 때
본체의 근본이 되는 줄기세포를
갱신한다, 하는 것은
들어본 적 있지만요.
p_13:
그렇다 하더라도 나라고 하는
의식이, 기억이 2개체 전의 나의
그것을 이을 뿐인 이상──

나는 이미 죽었고,
이 존재는 그야말로
좀비일 뿐인게 않을까?
p_15:
미안.
무거운 이야기를
할 생각은 없었어.
가벼운 농담이라고 생각해 줘.
n_16:
그렇게 생각하기에는 너무
깊은 문제에요…….
p_19:
샤스타 씨가 들려준 전설이야.
지금은 밤하늘이 걷히지 않는
마력 구름으로 덮여있지만──

이 구름의 너머에는 검은 천장이 있어서,
그곳에 '별'이라고 하는 보석이
셀 수 없을 정도로 많이 붙어 있다고.
n_20:
하늘 위의 보석, 이라니……　
그것도 구문명의 동화인가요?
p_21:
믿을 수 없겠지.
나도 샤스타 씨가 진지한 얼굴로
그런 이야기를 해서 웃어버렸어.

하지만 지금 해독이 끝난 고문서를 읽어보니
헛소리로 치부할 수 없는 모양이야.
p_22: ​ ……'단비를 내리는 구름 위, ​ 어머니 되는 거목보다도 더 높은 곳의 요람에서 우리의 아버지는 잠드네 '.
p_23:
극소수의 권력자만이
그라치아의 천변 시설에 숨겨진
최상 계층에 발을 들일 수 있다,
라는 소문이 있어.

만약 이 교의에 있는 <rb c=" 크레이들">요람</rb>이
정말로 존재하는 시설이라면,
그곳에서는 분명 이 눈으로
'별'을 볼 수 있을 거야.
p_25:
뭐, 샤스타 씨의
과장벽이 반영된 걸지도 모르지만.
p_26:
……오늘은 여기까지.
내일도 학원의 일이 끝난 뒤
저녁에 찾아올게.
복학 이야기는 그 때 해도 좋아.
n_51: <I><w2><m fadein>하늘 위 천장에 보석이 빛나는 세계.
n_52: <I><w2><m fadein>오늘 선생님께서 해주신 이야기는 모두 이상한 꿈 속 이야기 같아서.
n_53:
<I><w2><m fadein>그렇지만, 혹시 이 세계의 어딘가에
그런 <rb c="원  더  랜  드">이상한 세계</rb>가 있을 지도 모른다고──

b00:
'아파……'
부어오른 피부를 노엘은 손으로
눌렀습니다.
마족에게 습격당한 노엘은 더이상
싸울 수 없을 정도로
상처입고 말았습니다.
검푸른 멍, 베인 상처──
전투의 참혹함을 말하듯 노엘의
가는 몸 여기저기에 새겨진 그것들이
욱신욱신 아파옵니다.

아픔을 억누를 때, 자연스레 적의 검은
거구가 자신에게 다가오는 것을 떠올려
노엘은 공포로 숨을 삼킵니다.
'공격을 더 받았다가는, 나,
​또 다시──'
마족 무리에게 패해, 양분을 한 방울도
남기지 않으려는 듯 마력을 유린당한 기억이
뇌리에 스칩니다.
아프고, 괴롭고, 도움을 청하는 목소리조차
아무에게도 닿지 못할 정도로밖에 나오지 않아서.
…이제, 더 이상 그런 무서운 일은 겪고 싶지 않아.

──
간단한 일을 마치는 동안,
점점 공포심을 누그러뜨릴 수 있겠죠.
'괜찮아, 난 잘할 수 있어──'
학원 제일의 천재,
코르넬 가의 자랑스러운 막내딸.
그렇게 불릴 자격이 나에게 있다고는
그다지 생각하지 않지만, 자신있는
척 정도는 해도 괜찮을 거야.
지팡이가 노엘의 용기에 호응하듯
어렴풋이 비취색으로 반짝였습니다.

v_00:
노엘~, 뭐하고 있어~?
이제 정문 닫을 거야~.
n_01: 아, 언니, 수고했어요.
n_02:
언니, '별'에 대해 아세요?
이 구름의 위에 천장이 있어서,
그곳에 보석이 붙어 있고──
v_03:
<m joy>아하하~ 뭐야 그게.
엄청 로맨틱해~</m>
노엘은 옛날부터 그런
상상속 이야기를 좋아하는구나~.
n_10:
그 날 밤에는 '토끼'를 만날 수 있을까?
하는 마음에 두근거리며,
저는 침대 속에서 의식의 끈을 놓았습니다.
n_11:
상처받은 제 마음에
다시 불씨가 지펴진 듯한,
그런 따뜻함을 느꼈습니다.

n_00:
할머니.
내가 태어나기 전에
돌아가셨어.
꽤나 파천황인 수인
이었다는 것 같아.

계승을 거절하고
무덤에 들어간 이유는……
분명 본인만 알고 있겠지.
n_01:
할아버지.
수인과 사랑의 도피를 해서
엘프 마을에서
추방당했다는 것 같아.

……어렸을 때라 잘
기억은 나지 않지만,
상냥한 분이셨던 걸로 기억해.
n_02:
어머니는 내가 태어나고
바로 돌아가셨다는 것 같아.
사진으로밖에 본 적 없어.

n_00:
……<m fadein>우윽,
<m scary>콜록, 콜록…….
n_02:
<m fadein>아…… 아까 본 수인 씨.
으으 죄송해요.
폭탄, 가져오지 못해서…….
s_03:
<m scary>그그그그<m>런,
나보다는 자신의 걱정을
먼저 하라고!

몬스터 무리에게
등을 얻어맞으면서도
그렇게 필사적으로
폭탄을 지켜줘서…….
n_04:
<think>……
다행이야, 일단
회수는 했구나.

<think>하지만 상스러운
꼴을 보였어……
으으.
s_05:
어, 어어, 설 수 있겠어?
마을이나 거리에서
사람을 부르는 게 나으려나……?
n_06:
<m fadein>괜찮,아요.
혼자서 걸을 수 있고,
이정도는……익숙하니까.
s_07:
그렇니, 알겠어.
위험할 것 같으면
무리는 하지 마.
분명 누군가가
구해줄 테니까!
s_09:
그, 그럼……
나는 작업하러 갈게.
덕분에 살았어!
고마워!
n_10: ……으으. 빨리 돌아가자.

n_00:
이게 맞나요?
꽤 미끌미끌한데…….
s_01:
아아…… <m joy>어머니 거목이시여!
<m>정말 잘도 가져왔네……
말로 다 할 수 없을 정도로 고마워!
s_02:
답례라고 하기 뭣하지만,
이 주변에 이런 건
흔치 않을지도……
받아줬으면 해.
n_03: 폴른산 특산 향신료 세트……인가요?
s_04:

b00:
'으으, 또 가버렸어……'
마족에게 유린당해 솟구치는 오르가즘의
여운이 또 다시 얼얼하게 올라오는 것을
노엘은 느낍니다.
자손을 남기기 위해 본능적으로 성행위를
기분좋게 느끼도록 만들어진 신체 시스템이지만
전투중에 이형의 생물에게 국부를
희롱당한 끝에 절정을 맞이하다니,
코르넬의 막내딸로서 기품없는
모양임은 틀림없습니다.

애액으로 적셔진 속옷의 안쪽에는
미독을 머금은 마물의 체액이
아직 끈적하게 남아있어 걸을 때마다
노엘의 민감한 곳을 자극합니다.
그렇게 부풀어오른 클리토리스가 또 다시
미독에 닿아 벤치에서 웅크리고 있기만
해도 의식이 날아갈 것만 같은 쾌락이
노엘을 덮쳐옵니다.

노엘은 본능에 따라 볼록하게
부풀어오른 자신의 클리토리스를
엄지와 검지로 힘껏 자극했습니다.
위로. 아래로.
집어서 잡아당기고.
부드럽게 주위를
따라 그리듯이.

실제 전투 상황에는
가스 공격으로 실드가
약해진 사이에 적의 물리공격을
받아 파괴될 위험이 있어.

회피할지 실드로 막을지
상황에 따라서 선택해!
n_01: 네!
p_02: 그럼, 다음 실기를 시작하죠.

p_00:
…알겠나요, 노엘 양?
이건 실드의 연습이에요.
p_01:
분명 물리적으로 멀어지면
가스의 유효범위에서 벗어날
수 있고, 실제 전투 상황에는
그러는 편이 유리한
가스도 있지만…….
p_02:
그래도, 그저 실드를
전개할 뿐이어서는 우수한
너에게는 너무 단순한 걸까?
n_03:
죄송해요.
다음엔 제대로 할게요!
p_04:
좋아.
그럼, 같은 마법을 한 번 더 사용할게.
p_05:
알겠어요.
당신의 의욕을 봐서
다음 실기를 시작하죠.
p_06:
한 가지 알아둬야 할 것은
실드를 장시간 전개해서
붉게 빛나기 시작했을 때
적의 공격을 받으면 실드가
파괴될 수 있어.

그렇게 되면
쓰러져서 무방비해지니
각별히 주의하도록 해.

v_00:
마족쨩 무리를 쓰러트리면
소재가 들어있는 상자가
나온다는 것 같지만,
사실 이건 열지 않고
가지고 있어도 좋답니다!
n_01:
상자를 그대로
가지고 있는다……는 건가요?
v_02:
당연히 가지고 있으면
소지 한도에 압박을 주고
내용물도 사용할 수 없어.
무한정 가지고 있을 수는
없으니까~.
v_03:
그리고,
<c red>내용물의 품질은 열 때의
위험도에 영향<c>을 받아~.
그 상자를 획득했을 때의
위험도가 아니야.
v_04:
그러니까…… 훗훗후~.
상자를 얻고, 열지 않은 채
마족 씨와 놀고
상자를 잔뜩 모아서
열으라구~?
n_05:
품질이 좋은 아이템을
잔뜩…?
v_06:
그래~!
잔뜩 참고 참은 뒤
내보내는 편이 기분좋아~!
n_07:
그럼, 상자를 집에
잔뜩 모아뒀다가
그걸 가지고 가서
위험도를 높힌 후에……!
v_08:
아~, 그렇게는 할 수 없어.
집에 돌아오면 자동으로
모든 상자가 가버려.

노엘이 졌을 때는
더 안좋은데,
위험도가 0으로 리셋된 뒤에
상자가 열려.
v_09:
그래도 진다고 해서 가방 안의
아이템을 잃어버리지는 않으니까
질 것 같은 때에는
열어버리는 편이
현명한 선택일지도~.

n_00:
소형 마물이
꿈틀거리고 있어…….
소형은 마력에 대한
자성이 약해서
마술로 쓰러트릴 수 없어.
n_01:
우와, 천장에도 잔뜩……
높게 점프하면 닿을 것 같아.
n_02:
발판에 쉽게 올라가고 싶을 때나
공중에 오래 머무르고 싶을 때는
<c blue>공중에서 회피<c>를 하면
부드럽게 갈 수 있을 거야.

i_00:
으아…… 마력,
또 빨려…… 아…….
i_01: 가악, 앗, 흐앗…….
i_02: 이, 이상…… 그만…….
i_04:
큰 기술을 피했어……!
지금이라면……!
i_05: 지금이야, 노엘 코르넬!
i_06: 꺄아아아악!
i_08: 시, 싫어 싫어……!

n_00:
도중에 마족을 만나서……
그래서, 그.
조금, 실수해서.
p_00:
혹시……
진건가요?
n_01:
네, 조금…… 그래도,
큰일이 일어나기 전에 풀려나서,
빨린 마력도 많지는…….
p_02:
……무서웠죠?
여기, 따듯한 차에요.

천천히 마력을 회복하는
효과가 있고,
혈액 손실에도 좋아요.
n_03:
……맛있어……
맛있어……요…….
p_04:
착하지 착하지.
무사히 돌아왔고,
심부름도 잘 해냈구나.

당신은 해야 할 일을
잘 해냈어요.
p_05:
아팠죠──
지금은 괜찮나요?
다른 아픈 곳은 없나요?
n_06:
흐윽……
괜찮아, 요.
p_07:
만약을 위해서
진찰해도 괜찮을까?
가슴을 내놓아 볼래?
p_08:
심작 박동은……
조금 불안정하지만
정상 범위네.

그래도……
심각하지는 않더라도
레벨 3의 혈액 손괴의
징후가 있어.
p_09:
차의 약효가 돌 때까지,
이론 수업을 할까요?
n_10:
그럼, 방으로 돌아가요.
오늘은 물리? 수학인가요?
p_11:
아니요, 오늘은 이걸로
──짠!

p_00: 으…쌰.
p_01:
선생님이 지금부터
노엘 양에게
마법을 사용할 테니,
막아보세요.
p_03:
우선 실드 스킬의 훈련이에요.
<key lsh/><c red>실드를 전개하고 있는 동안
유독한 가스로부터
몸을 지킬 수 있어요.<c>
p_04:
제가 사용한 마법에서
살포되는 가스를
들이마시지 않도록
해 보세요.
자, 시작!

p_01:
괜찮나요?
수면 가스를 제대로 들이마신
바람에 쓰러졌네요.
n_02:
죄, 죄송합니다.
다음엔 더 잘할게요…….
p_03:
실드를 장시간 전개하면
붉게 빛나며 강도가 저하돼요.

그래도, <c red>물리적인 공격을 받지
않는 이상 실드는 파괴되지 않아요<c>.
그래서 가스가 가라앉을 때까지는
실드를 전개하고 있어도 괜찮아요.
p_04:
……그럼 한 번 더!
이번에는 가스를
들이마시지 않도록 해봐요!

n_00: '무엇을 위해서 싸우는 것인가'…….
n_01:
어렸을 적 언니와 숲에서 놀았을 때
내가 평소의 산책 코스에
싫증이 나서……

언니는 말렸지만 설득해서
숲속 더 깊은 곳까지 갔어.
n_02:
거기서 마력 식물을
실수로 뽑아서……
마족 떼에게 습격당했어.
n_03:
다리가 풀려서 설 수 없어진
나를 피하게 하고, 언니는
마술로 순식간에
마족을 전멸시켰어.
n_04: ……엄청 멋있었어.

나도 강해져서,
이 세계를 좀 더──
n_05:
──!　
<m scary>싫어…… 오지마…… 도와줘………!

n_00:
도중에 마족과 마주쳤지만,
어떻게든 쓰러트렸어요.
p_01:
<m ple>싸웠어?!
<m>위험한 곳에는 가지 않기로
약속했잖아.
n_02:
죄, 죄송해요……　
돌아가는 도중에 한 마리만,
돌아서 갈 수도 없어보여서.
p_03:
……당신은 우수한 학생이지만,
2주 전의 일도 있으니까요.

그러니, 오늘은 당신의 상태를 진찰해서
마술을 사용할 수 있을지
판단할 예정이었어요.
……아픈 곳은 없니?
n_04:
괜찮아요. 마력을 충전할 때에도
아픔은 딱히 없었어요.
p_05:
만약을 위해 진찰할게.
가슴을 내놓으세요.
n_06:
그, 그럼……
실례하겠습니다.
p_07:
심장 박동은…… 정상이네.
체내 마력 응고도 없어보여.
숨을 깊게 들이쉬어 볼래?
p_09:
이제 괜찮아.
고마워, 노엘 양.
n_10:
감사합니다.
……그러고보니, 익시아 씨가
마술을 전해드렸다고.
p_11:
네, 받았어요.
그래도 실기 이전에
우선 이론 수업부터 끝낼까요?
오늘은 비장의 그것을
가져왔어요──

x_00:
아, 너도 쇼핑…?
헤에, 나쁜 아이네.
n_01: 나쁜 아이?
x_02:
이 가게, 마을에서 추방당한
마녀의 가게라는 소문이 있잖아.
나도 여기에 간다고
엄마나 아빠한테 말하면 혼나.

그래서 아침 일찍 일어나서
슬쩍 오는 거야.
무섭지, 가시덤불 자란 길의 다리나
중간에 버섯이 잔뜩 있는 곳이라던가!

그 근처에서 땅속으로 들어가는
유령을 봤다는 이야기도
있어. 알아?
n_03:
우리 집, 그런 도시전설
같은 게 돌고 있구나….
n_04:
…그렇지만 어제
무언가 있었던 것 같은 느낌도 있었어.
x_04:
역시 그렇지!
여, 여기서 부적이라던가 사면
귀신이 화나서 튀어나오는게 아닐까?
n_05:
귀신을 보지 않으려고
사는 거 아니었나요…?

noelcane_00:
<device>구조 신호를 수신했습니다.
구조 신호를 수신했습니다.
　추정 위치: 101.78 / -0.045
　거리: 2.39
n_01:
또 구조 신호?!
게다가, 엄청 가까워……
혹시, 이 앞에……
n_02:
익시아 씨의 상태를
확인해야 해……!

n_04:
<m ple>뭐라고요?!
그러면 익시아 씨는
어떡해요?!
n_06:
……저, 저는 노엘 코르넬.
베르밋 국립대학 소속,
레벨 III 사관 후보생….

적어도 한 명, 제 친구가……
분명, 대형 마족에게 붙잡혀
움직일 수 없는 상태에요.
ixiacane_07:
<device><noise>……너는 그곳에서 벗어나라.
녀석은 피해를 입었다고는 해도
사관 후보생 한두 명의 힘으로
어떻게 할 수 있는 상대가 아니다.

<device><noise>네 목숨이 위험해지기 전에
그곳에서 가능한 한――
n_09:
<m fadein>서두르지 않으면
엘프 마을에서
군이 파견돼서……
익시아 씨는 못 본 체 당해……?
n_10: <m fadein>…….
n_11:
아니야, 구하는 거야.　
내가 구해야 해……!

n_00:
소재를 모아올 때의
요령이 있나요?
v_01:
오오~, 또 나를 위해서
소재를 모아줄 거야?
노엘, 정말 착한 아이네~
<m joy>착하지 착하지 쓰담쓰담~.
n_02:
와왓, 지금은
손님도 계시니까~.
v_03:
그렇지, 나무라던가 보석이라던가,
채집할 수 있는 것들은
집에 돌아오면 부활해.
그것쯤은 알고 있지?

그렇지만 소재에는 품질이 있어서…
이건 말이야, <c red>노엘이 인기 많을 때
좋은게 나오기 쉬워</c>~.
n_04: 인기…….
v_05:
그래, 가방 안에
마력 자기계가 있지?
이건 지금 있는 곳의
위험도를 표시해줘.

노엘이 마족쨩을
잔뜩 괴롭히면
갈곳잃은 마력이 점점……
v_06:
<m joy>신나게 뭉게뭉게해져~!<m>
이 무언가 올라오는 이게
소재의 질과도 관련이 있어~!
n_06:
하, 하나하나 외설스러운
비유할 필요 없어요.
v_07: 정말이지~ 순수하다니까.

n_00:
요리, 해봤어요!
어떤가요?
d_01: 별로야.
n_02: 에엑!
d_03:
일단 나는 이 부엌에
애착이 있어.
좋은 일이 있었던 날에는
가~끔 좋은 조미료를 사기도 하고.

알겠냐?
태워먹으면 절연이다.
n_04: 으으….
d_05:
그리고 번화가에서 사온 식재료는
아직 남았다고는 해도
이건 내가 쓰고 싶은 거고…

그러니까 요리는 노엘이 가지고 있는
소재로 충당했으면 좋겠어.
n_06: 네, 수집은 특기니까요.
d_07:
그리고 조리도구도.
이 조세핀에게는
손가락 하나 대지 마.
d_09:
귀엽지? 기름을 듬뿍 먹인
사랑의 프라이팬이야.
이 상태가 되기까지
몇 년이 걸린 줄 알아?
n_10:
<think>확실히 틸데 오빠가
진학한 이후로 계속 쓴 것 같아….
d_11:
그러니 노엘은 당분간
이 작은 냄비 하나로
하면 좋겠어.
n_12:
와아, 주시는 건가요?
감사합니다!
d_13:
그럼 만들 예정이던
토스트를 만들어 줄까?

오늘은 특별히 재료를
제공해 주겠는데,
아까도 말했듯
다음부터는 스스로 구한
재료로 만들도록 해.
d_14:
오늘도 집에 있는 재료를
주고 만들게 해주겠지만,
완성된 샌드위치는
내 간식인 걸로.

d_00:
요리를 먹으면 모험 중에
꽤나 좋은 버프가 들어와.
HP 자동회복이라던가
공격력이 엄청 오른다던가…….

그래서 노엘이 마족에게
발정하러 출발하는 것이 아닌 이상
먹고 가는 편이 좋아.
n_01: 그런 짓 안해요!
d_02:
다만 요리의 효과나 유효시간은
소재의 질이나 양이 영향을 줘.
노엘이 마족과 전투할 때마다
유효시간이 줄어들어.

그런 의미에서 배가 고파지면
집으로 돌아오는 편이
안정적이기도 하지.
n_03:
밖에서 먹기 위한
도시락 같은 것은 못 만드나요?
d_04:
요리는 도시락통이 없다면
거점에서만 먹을 수 있어.
마력 안개에 닿자마자
곧바로 상태가 나빠지니까.
d_05:
그리고, 도시락통은 비싸서
우리 집에 없어!
d_06:
뭐, 누나의 매물 중에는 있다지만
그건 상품이니까 밖에서 먹고 싶다면
스스로 도시락통을 만들도록 해.

d_00:
식재료마다 요리해서 먹었을 때
여러 효과를 얻을 수 있는 것은
알고 있지?
n_01:
잔뜩 만들어서 여러 효과가 있는
음식을 많이 먹으면
최강의 내가 될 수 있다……?
d_02:
노엘의 요리 솜씨에 달렸지만.
다만 과식에는 주의해.

만복도 게이지가 가득 찼을 때
코스트가 높은 요리를 먹으려고 하면
당연하지만 조금밖에
위장에 들어가지 않아.
즉, 요리의 효력이 감소하게 돼.
n_03:
먹다 남은 음식을 창고로

代表著料理的成本。

會有多飽的意思。

依據自己的飽食
狀態好好的跟
自己的肚子商量
調整食物的成本吧。

但是、依據食材也會有、
吃了會有特殊效果的料理

小麥的效果是
魔力的中立性…也就是、
相關著魔術炸裂後
容不容易回收能力
的意思。

中立性如果低的話、
魔術攻擊完後、
有可能會被敵人吸收
一下子巨大化。
d_11:
這個效果會有多少
是會受到材料右邊
的影響度的狀態
影響而變化。

如果比材料必要量（這裡的話是2）
丟入還要多的材料的話、
那麼全體的成本就會變高
但是品質也會平均地下降。

所以不要吃太多、
就可以好好品嘗
食物的美味了。

p_22:
在目錄選單中
選擇「技能」哦。

現在入手的技能在
「防禦」的標籤那一欄。
按<key ltab/>和<key rtab/>來選擇標籤
並請打開試試。
p_23:
「迴避」和「護盾」的地方、
將「使用」的勾勾打開。
將這個勾勾打開就可以使用了。
p_24:
這樣就、可以照著說明裡寫著的、
按<key lsh/>使用護盾...
按<key lsh/>+<key la/><key ra/>來使用迴避了!
p_25:
順帶一提、這次是因為要示範的關係
才會將「使用」的勾勾關閉的…

<rb c="spell">魔術</rb>不是只有
射出的使用方法哦。

<c red>一旦詠唱魔術後、
然後做出迴避或護盾時<c>
魔術的能量就會儲蓄在法杖裏
此時也可以移動和跳躍。

然後在這個狀態下
對敵人直接攻擊時、
魔術的能量將會在
敵人的身上炸裂!

<c blue>散彈槍<c>的這個技巧、
還請記得好好活用。

但是、魔力儲蓄時
受到敵人的攻擊
也會容易散發大量魔力。

然後、魔術如果不在完全充能、
也就是不能馬上發射的時候、
散彈槍也會發揮不太出多少威力。

雖然有威力、但是代價是
也需要特別靠近敵人、可以
說是高風險、高回報的攻擊。

p_04:
愛麗絲開始很無聊地坐在姐姐身邊，無所事事
一兩次她偷看了姐姐正在看的書。

但是、那本書看起來很無聊。
「既沒有畫也沒有任何的對話、看了好像也沒什麼意思」。
p_05:
是不是該去摘一些雛菊編個花環呢？
啊啊(哈欠)、但是很想睡、
而且還要特地拿起來真麻煩。

就在這麼想的同時、突然
一個白色的兔子從她眼前經過。
p_06:
明明是沒什麼特別的、非常平常的景象。
「天哪!我要遲到了!」、
穿著背心的兔子單手拿著一個鐘錶跑過──

咦、怎麼會有這樣子的事呢!　
愛麗絲站了起來、向著兔子追了過去、
跳進了一個很大的洞穴。
p_07:
愛麗絲大膽地試著舔起了瓶子裡面的東西。
櫻桃撻?卡仕達醬?鳳梨?　
有各式各樣的味道、非常的美味!

就在嘗過之後、發生了奇怪的事情了。
愛麗絲的身高縮小到剩下僅僅的10英吋。

「正好穿過那個門的大小」
愛麗絲高興地笑著。
p_08:
──愛麗絲這樣的對著自己說。
「你以為你是我的女僕還是什麼的?　明明就不知道我是誰!」

但是、下次見到他時，不知道是否能找到他的扇子和手套。
愛麗絲沒有敲門就進入了、掛著兔子先生名牌的家了──
p_09:
一下變大、一下變小、又是兔子、又是老鼠。
至少比起在家里好多了!　
可憐的愛麗絲碎碎念著。

但是、比我讀過的任何童話故事、都更充滿著神秘的世界。
如果長大的話、可以把這個事件的事情寫成書嗎。
「至少我、不想在這地方成為大人」。
p_09_2:
「把那個小女孩的頭砍下來!」女王面色發青地大吼著。
但是、卡片的士兵們一副非常困擾的表情。

「沒有人要聽你的話的樣子」　
回復了原來大小的愛麗絲這樣的回話著。

因恐怖和憤怒被弄得一團糟、並發出很小的聲音、
從他們的裡頭鑽出、持續逃跑的愛麗絲。

回神一轉、愛麗絲正躺在姐姐的膝蓋
並望著姐姐。
「愛麗絲、早安。好像做了個很長的夢了。」

聽見了姐姐溫柔的聲音、愛麗絲充滿喜悅地說。
「我夢見了一個非常不可思議的夢喔!」

愛麗絲將還記得起來的部分
將兔子洞裡不可思議的事情全部告訴了姐姐。
姐姐也很溫柔地聽著愛麗絲所說出的事直到結束。

「非常美妙的夢呢。但是、差不多到了喝茶的時間了」
愛麗絲站了起來、繼續想著夢的後續、
往家裡回去──。
n_11:
這個是……歴史書嗎?
總覺得、每個事情
都有點誇大不實了……。
p_12:
也是呢…。說不定有可能
大人為了讀給小孩子
所創造出來的故事呢。
p_12_2:
但是呢、古時候的人
也太充滿的想像力了吧、
真是太佩服了。
n_13:
途中出現的、
「兔子」和「貓咪」
的生物、
是類似矮人族的動物嗎?
p_14:
嗯、不是吧、大概是不一樣的東西吧。
確實來說矮人族是住在
地底下的種族但是……

要說是哪一種的話
應該是接近像我們祖先
那樣子的小動物吧。
n_15: 祖先嗎……。
p_16:
從採掘所發現舊世代的
生命痕跡是很少見的──
應該說、幾乎沒有過。

至少稱為「貓」的這個家畜、
在過去的文明之人來說、
是最親近的夥伴之類的
這點是確定的。
p_16_2:
沒錯、我記得你的祖母大人也有說過
「自己身上有流著貓的血脈」。

所以說、諾艾爾頭上突起的那個
應該也是來自祖母那裡
類似貓的由來的東西。
n_17:
……我不喜歡、這個。
摩擦到帽子或頭髮就會很癢、
而且、學校的朋友和家裡的人、
都將我排除在外──

我因為跟姐姐大人和
哥哥大人長得不一樣
的關係、在柯奈爾家裡
像被當異類一樣。

n_00:
普莉姆拉老師、
今天來到我們家
真的是非常感謝。
從遙遠的街過來、
還帶著杖和古文書……。
p_00:
可愛又重要的學生
在這失落而且辛苦的時候。
這種程度而已
並沒有什麼的。
p_01:
……我說、諾艾爾阿。
你有總有一天要實現的
目標或是夢想嗎?
n_02: 目標嗎……

成為厲害的魔術師……
在各式各樣的地方旅行、
並成為對某人來說的英雄、之類的……
n_03:
討、討厭啦。總覺得好像說了
很羞恥的話了。
對不起、說了像是童話般、
不現實的事了。
p_03:
沒這回事。
這並沒有什麼好羞恥的喔。
p_04:
確實來說、你並不是
童話裡的公主大人。
p_04_2:
就算這樣──
你也是會想要跳進
兔子的洞穴冒險。
p_05:
沒錯。　沒問題、諾艾爾的話
我、認為一定有辦法實現的。
畢竟是我看上的
優秀的學生呢。
n_06: 非常謝謝你。
n_07:
……普莉姆拉老師
的夢想是什麼呢、
可以告訴我嗎?
p_07:
………見到之前的我、
問他為什麼不繼承記憶、
然後賞他個巴掌等等的。
p_09:
我們純粹的獸人、
作為一個個體的壽命很短──

要定期地到「天上設施」來做
記憶的「傳承」用輪迴來維持著
生命、的這個事情你知道吧。
n_10: 是的。
p_11:
在年輕的克隆個體的腦海裡
植入記憶的資料
由此以來、我──「普莉姆拉」的
存在將可以繼續存在。

……但是、那也就是說、
沒有傳承下來的前三次之前的
「普莉姆拉」、不就是代表著
已經死去了的意思了?
n_12:
…我聽說
準備克隆的時候、也會重新
構成身體裡的幹細胞。
p_13:
就算這樣、我的意識、
記憶、只有傳承到
前兩個的時候──

我就已經死去了、這個
存在就跟殭屍沒兩樣了
不是嗎?
p_15:
對不起、
我並不是要把話
說得這麼沉悶的。
如果你可以把它當成
輕鬆的玩笑那就好了。
n_16:
真要這麼說的話
這個問題很深奧…。
p_17:
也是……
如果真要選的話。
我想看看「星星」。
p_19:
從沙斯塔那裡聽說的傳說的話題。
現在、這個夜空之所以沒有辦法
放晴是因為被魔力的雲覆蓋著的緣故──

在這個雲後的黑色天花板上有著、
附著著無數稱為「星星」的寶石。
n_20:
空中上的寶石、什麼的……　
那也是古代文明的童話故事嗎?
p_21:
說不定你沒有辦法相信。　
我也因為沙斯塔擺著一副很正經的臉，
說著這樣的話題
所以最初也是放聲大笑著。

但是、現在在我讀完了古文書以後、
我也很難確定這個是真是假。
p_22: ……「在下著恩惠雨的雲之上、 在有如母親的大樹之上 克雷托爾、我們父親在睡著」。
n_22:
這是古拉提亞正教裡的一段話、
對吧。
p_23:
據說傳聞
只有極少數一部份權力者
可以進入古拉提亞
天上設施隱藏的最上層。

如果、這個教義裡的<rb c="搖籃">克雷托爾</rb>、
是真的存在的施設的話。
在那裡的話、應該可以親眼見證
「星星」──
p_25:
開玩笑的。我說不定被
沙斯塔傳染到了、誇張的習慣了。
p_26:
……今天、就說到這裡了。
明天也、在學校工作結束時
在黃昏時再見吧。
復學的事情到那時候再說吧
沒問題的。
n_26:
我知道了。
回家、請多加小心。
p_27:
那麼就、
晚安了、諾艾爾。

n_51: <I><w2><m fadein>天空上的天花板、有著散發光輝寶石的世界。
n_52: <I><w2><m fadein>今日從老師那裡聽到的話、每一個都像是不可思議的故事。

b00:
「好痛啊……」
諾艾爾用手按住了因受傷
腫起來的皮膚。
遭受魔族襲擊的諾艾爾、
幾乎身受了快要站不
起來程度的傷害。
青黒色的瘀青、滲血的割痕
像是在述說著淒慘的故事、
深深地刻印在諾艾爾小小的身軀上、
並發出陣陣之痛。

每次忍住身上的疼痛時、自然地
會想起黑色又巨大的怪物向
自己襲擊而來的畫面、諾艾爾
因恐懼而吞了一口氣。
「如果再受到一點攻擊的話、我、
就又會──」
腦海裡回想起了、敗給了一群魔族、
身上的魔力被吸得一乾二淨
而遭蹂虐的記憶。 又痛苦、
又恐怖、求救的聲音也傳達
不到別人耳裡。
…已經、不想要有那樣的恐怖回憶了。

──
在經過簡單的包紮後、
心中的恐懼慢慢地消散。
「沒事的、我的話可以做到的──」
被稱為學校的才女、
柯奈爾家裡驕傲的小女兒。
我雖然不覺得自己有
能被這個異名稱呼的資格、
但至少我可以裝出有自信的樣子。
法杖彷彿在呼應著諾艾爾的勇氣般地
閃耀著翡翠色的光芒。

v_00:
諾艾爾、你在做什麼呢～?　
大門已經要關起來了～。

幻想般的事情～。

不繼承就埋進墓的理由……
大概、只有本人才知道。

繞遠路了、但是都往道路

b00:
「嗚嗚、又被弄到高潮了……」
被魔族蹂虐、諾艾爾還感受著
因高潮的餘韻在身體中
麻麻的感覺。
為了繁衍後代、身體會本能地
對性的行為感受到很舒服
但是、在戰鬥中裡被異形的怪物們
玩弄著私處、最終迎來高潮、
對於柯奈爾家裡的小女兒
這是一種非常可恥的行為。

在沾滿的愛液的內褲裡
也留著了許多的媚毒
魔物的體液、每走一步都
刺激著諾艾爾敏感的地方。
然後、激起的陰蒂又觸碰著媚毒
就算只是坐在椅子上緊縮著身體而已，
也有著幾乎快讓
諾艾爾失去意識般的快樂感。

諾艾爾遵從著本能、
用自己的拇指和食指
給予著自己的愛莓刺激。
一上、一下、
又搓、又拉著。
溫柔地
撫弄著。

d_10: You will see details of the finished product in the box below.
This fork and knife symbol represents how filling the food is. The bar represents your stomach capacity.
The more ingredients you add to each dish, the more filling it will be.
It's in your best interest to eat until you're full, so plan ahead when preparing each meal.
Some ingredients have special effects when eaten.
Wheat helps keep mana neutral. Neutral mana is easier to recover after it scatters.
If mana neutrality is low, it could lead to a situation where monsters absorb all the scattered mana and become huge.
d_11: The strength of each ingredient's effect that will shine through in the finished product is displayed on the right side (Pow).
The food will be more filling if you add more than the minimum amount, but you won't be getting the most out of each ingredient.
In short, don't crowd your dish with too many distinct or powerful flavors. Allow yourself the chance to savor them.

n_05: That's...

d_06: Ah, yes! I'll be right with you!

v_00: As I said, the danger level of an area will increase as you defeat groups of monsters.
You can re-fight groups as much as you like, but the rewards will only drop once.
v_01: Monsters will be stronger and attack in greater numbers at high danger levels.
They'll also be much more aggressive and might ambush you even if you haven't touched a mana plant.
v_02: So don't stay out too late. But, for the satisfaction of our customers, try edging as close to nightfall as possible~!
n_03: Edging...I'm not sure that's such a good idea. Anyway, you're saying I should come back at a reasonable hour?
v_04: That's right~ Just promise me you'll be extra careful if you do decide to stay out after dark.
v_05: Oh, one more thing! When the danger level is low, you can warp between benches you've already sat down on!
v_06: If the danger level rises, you'll have to walk. However, <c blue>you can always return home from any bench<c>~

n_02: <m fadein>Ah...um, Tilde, do you know where my clothes are?
d_03: Huh? Oh. It was time to do laundry, so they're being washed.
I mean, you should've left them in the laundry room yesterday.
n_04: I didn't bring a change of clothes!
d_05: That's your own fault. Just run down the hallway to the wardrobe.
n_06: Uu...fine, I'm going. Look away, please...
d_07: I've already seen you naked when we were kids...it's a little late to worry about it now.

Nobody from the Cornehl family is allowed to enter, except for Zeth and our father.

and hasn't been back to her parent's place in awhile.

I did it...

...Uu,
my heart is beating so fast...

1, 2, 3...
Thank goodness, they're all still here.
n_03: The sun has set, but I still managed to gather...
n_04: I...still...managed...

x_00: 87, 88...Yes, commander! I'm checking our supplies right...now...
Oh, you're not the commander. Their outfit is white just like yours.
Which unit are you from?　You should probably get to your post before the commander sees you slacking off.
x_01: Did you hear about the heavy damage our unit sustained during the last battle?
We had to use most of our supplies.
I'm checking to see what's left right now. Where was I, 90...no, 86...?
Guess I'm starting over...
x_02: 94, 95...yikes, there are still a lot of troops that haven't received their supplies...
These ones are being sent straight to the front lines, you'll have to go to the office to get yours.
x_03: <think>...is this girl even in our army?
<think>If a cutie like her was on the front lines, I'd definitely be distracted watching her get atta-...I mean, avoid attacks...

n_02: ...Why is the device floating?
p_03: Well...the servers for the authentication system are located at the Heavenly Facilities in Grazia.
Maybe it gets a better signal up there?

n_04: <c red>If you pluck a mana plant, monsters will see you as a trespasser and attack.</c>
If I go straight home from here, I can avoid roads with mana plants. I'll be okay...I just need to stay calm...

n_00:
S-Something amazing just happened!
Sorry about my dress lifting up...
p_01: After the attack, spell device authentication has become even more complex.
It's got something called three-step authentication and uses WiFu technology to communicate with the servers.
p_01_2: But it's almost twice as heavy as before, and can still only be used once.
Transporting them has become such a pain.
p_02:
The spell you registered was the <c red>Ground Bomb<c>.
It compresses mana into a small sphere that sticks to floors and walls.
p_03: It'll automatically explode when any monster comes near and put them in a daze, so it's good for crowd control.
Give it a try.
n_04: ...? What's this?
p_05: It's a candy box...with a letter inside?
'To the 18-year-old me, how are you? My dream is to become a cool magician like big sis'.
n_06: Uwa! Uwa!! This is the time capsule I buried so that I can open it with my sister!
We weren't supposed to open it for another three years!!
p_07: Teehee...
Just like that, your bombs can blow up the floor or walls that look like they might have something in them.
If you think something looks suspicious, use it and see.
p_08: I got you something else. A gift to celebrate your recovery.
n_09: Waah, thank you so much...
p_10: It's actually a skill for athletes. You've always had a spring in your step, though, so I figured you might be able to master it.
p_10_2: ...By the way, do you remember how to set your skills?
p_20: Well then, let's practice, shall we? Try opening the menu.
p_21: You can set the skills you obtained from the 'Skills' menu.
p_22: Now you know how to choose the 'Skill' menu.

The skills you just acquired are in the 'Defense' tab. Try opening it.
<key ltab/> / <key rtab/>
p_23: There is a 'Use' checkbox next to the 'Dodge' and 'Shield' skills. Check or uncheck them to choose whether they are active or not.
p_24: <key lsh/> deploys a shield, and <key lsh/>+<key la/><key ra/> performs a dodge!
p_25: By the way, this is just an example so it's still set to off.
Normally when you obtain a skill, it will be on by default. So don't worry about setting it every time you get a new skill.
p_26: Now, let's begin the practical skill test!
p_27: That's what I thought, but I had to check. Now then─
p_28: Let's begin the practical skill test!

xa_00: I definitely landed more hits than you...
xb_01: No way. Besides, my White Arrow struck a vital organ, so I dealt more damage than you.
xa_02: Psh, it shrugged that off like it was nothin'. Also I severed it's thickest root, so...

x_00: There are ways to use your spells other than simply casting them.
While chanting a spell, you can <c red>dodge or attack<c> to store the spell's power in your cane.
Then you can strike the monster with your cane to blast them with its concentrated power!
This technique is called <c blue>Shotgun<c>. Try it out.
Mana stored with this technique is very volatile. It can dissipate easily if you get hit while holding it.
Activating Shotgun without fully chanting the spell first will cause its power to be almost nonexistent.
It's a powerful technique, but you have to get close to the enemy to use it. Its a high-risk, high-reward thing.

n_03:

n_06: ...Although, it seems like I don't have my shield enabled yet. I should probably open the menu with <key menu/> and set it up.

n_12: I have to hurry back to her...!

v_00: Ah, it's hazy, but I'm starting to remember now~ I told you not to explore any deeper, but you didn't listen.
n_01: Sorry for all the trouble I caused you back then...
v_02: You've always been stubborn, Noel. You just couldn't deny your curiosity, could you?
n_03: Uu...so embarrassing. But, your protective spell helped me discover who I want to be.
v_04: Spell? I'm not licensed to cast magic, so that's probably not what I used.
n_05: Eh?
v_06: You see, back then I was very attractive. People just couldn't keep their hands off me~
Every so often, some brazen older gentlemen would try to do something inappropriate.
v_07: So to defend myself, I carried capsules that would explode when thrown. BOOM~!
They contained a mana-damaging drug strong enough to daze an elf. It worked on monsters too, since they're basically made of mana.
n_07: I had no idea... Alchemy and magic were indistinguishable to me back then. But, all that matters is that you saved me.
v_08: I didn't have a permit for alchemy at the time either.
If I had been caught, I would've gotten in trouble for both illegal possession and synthesizing.
Oops, keep that a secret from dad and the guards, will you~?
n_09: O-okay...

l_00:
Looks like nobody is getting through with the road collapsed.
I'll keep waiting, but...I'm getting a little sleepy.
I heard they're making progress on removing debris from the other side of the road. Think they can handle a job this big?
l_01:
...Noel, please take it easy.
Also, you should fix your clothes as soon as possible...there are leering eyes everywhere.

v_01: Huh?  Can I help you?
v_03:
<m ple>Ah! You're a customer of
'The room'! <m>You're here a little earlier than your appointment time. Did you want to see me that badly?
v_05: Ehehe, happy to hear it! I like your honesty, Jade.
v_07: I'll show you to the back. Let's enjoy today, just the two of us, together...
v_09: Noel, go upstairs and get Tilde. I need him to watch the store.
n_10: O-Okay.
n_11: Eek...!
v_13: Noel~ If you stand there looking like that, people might think you're using the room with us.
...Although, I'm fine with that if you are.
n_14: N-no! Not in my current state...
v_15: I know you're a bit worn-out right now, but can you go upstairs and get Tilde? I need him to watch the store.
n_16: ...Okay.

x_00: The road collapsed and we can't get to Grazia.
I overslept this morning, so I grabbed my breakfast and ran all the way downhill from the village.
I was in such a rush that I barely nibbled on my toast, but it was still all for nothing!
I suppose I could climb up the stairs and go along the tree to reach the other side, but...I'm a bit too tired to head back to the village right now~
x_01: I heard they called in some kind of...beastmen workers? to help clear the debris. I wonder if they'll be able to clear it all overnight?

Might as well say that I can't make it today and just skip class.
Should I?

d_00: I'll say it again because it's extremely important: You cannot generally bring food outside of the house.
If you fight outside even once, all the food you have on hand will spoil due to exposure to magic.
You won't gain anything from eating spoiled food, so store it or eat before you go out.
n_01: What should I do if I get hungry out there?
d_02: Just come back home and eat.
Or buy one of those special lunch boxes that can prevent magic from spoiling your food.
n_03:
Um...
Can I ask one more thing?
d_04: What is it?
n_05: Can I eat this sandwich now, while it's fresh...?
d_06:
Sigh...you glutton.
Sure, go ahead. Enjoy.

n_01: Wah...!

<device>Searching for
nearby magical devices...
......
Found: 1
Transmit distress signal?
n_03: Ah, um...y-yes.
n_05: Wow! This must be one of the "WiFu" features...
The secondhand staff I was using until two weeks ago didn't have anything like this! I can't believe it understands and responds to my voice...
n_05_2: Umm...can you please tell me more about the distress signal.
cane_06:
<device>User affiliation:
Bermit Academy
Class: Cadet Student

I have to go save her quickly...!

I don't think he'll be coming...
n_09: I should mark the position of the distress signal on my map. Let's see, it should be right about...here...
n_10: Ixia, please be safe...!

x_00: Yawn...err, you say somethin'?
x_01: ...Eh? You encountered a monster on your way back!? That's not good!
x_02: My patrol route is far from the elf village, but there aren't any magical plants near it, right?
I volunteered for that route because I thought it'd be an easy one.
...Miss, your uniform looks like the old-fashioned ones healers used to wear...are you from the Elf Village?
x_04: Hey, could you do me a favor and keep the news of this monster just between us?
If word gets out there was a monster outbreak under my watch, I'll never hear the end of it.
x_05: ...Ah, you're not? That's surprising. I've only ever seen my mom and grandmother's generation wear those clothes.
x_06:
At any rate, I'll contact the extermination team right away.
It might take them a while to get here though...
x_07: The recent reports of large monsters are keeping them pretty busy.
Based on the report pattern, the monster seems to be moving towards the city.
x_08: If that's true and they can predict it's next location, I'll probably be sent to intercept it.
Sigh...what a pain.
n_10: ...Y, yes...I'm fine.
x_10:
......
(staring)
n_11: Um...excuse me, I said I'm okay, so please stop staring...

v_00: <m fadein>Mornin', Noel~ Yawn...
n_01: Good morning, sister. Still not a morning person, huh?
v_02: Nope. Think I'll sleep at the desk 'til customers arrive. Oh, here...for you.
n_03: ...A letter? Ah, it's from Ixia.
v_04: Is she the floaty little chatterbox that came in earlier?
n_05: Yes, that's Ixia. She's a friend from school...ah, but she thinks of me as a rival, so she probably doesn't see me as a friend...
v_06: That's just her roundabout way of saying she loves you, Noel~
n_07: You think so...?
v_08: See? She must really be into you~
She had to go from the village into town, get the spell, come here, and still has to go to school, no~?
n_09: That all sounds so tiring... Does she really have the energy for that so early in the morning?
v_10: If so, that's really impressive~ There's no way I could do that...fuwawa...
v_11:
Ah, here comes a customer.
Welcome~
Alright, time to work!
n_12: ...I should wait a bit for Ixia to come. I can kill some time by talking to the customers and guards.
n_13: ...I'm hungry.
Tilde should be cooking breakfast in the kitchen, I'll go check on him.

n_00: This road leads into town. I'm supposed to be home before the sun sets...
n_01:
But, if I can get some
extra materials...
A-ah...sorry.
f_02: Sigh...from the looks of it, the monsters got you. Again.
n_03: I'm sorry...I still can't control my magic very well...
f_04: Tell me honestly, do you think being enrolled as a cadet at Bermit is really what's best for you?
n_05: ...What do you mean?
f_06: Sigh...do I have to spell it out? It's about whether you have any talent for combat at all.
f_08: You participated in battle when the academy was under attack two weeks ago.
Your staff and uniform were completely destroyed, and the monsters drained all your mana.
For awhile they didn't think you'd ever be able to cast spells again.
n_09: Yes, but...today I was able to cast a spell without any trouble...
f_10: Prior to that, weren't you called the prodigy of the cadet class?
The entire school probably knows your name.
n_11: E-Everyone in our class was talented...I wasn't anything special.
f_12: That level of modesty borders on sarcasm, so watch it. Now listen up. The Cornehl family was expelled from the village...
...yet our youngest daughter, a half-elf, has better magic skills than the pure-blood elves at the academy.
Do you know what that means?
n_13: U-Um...
f_14: It means we're a huge target for jealousy.
Your defeat turned our entire family into a laughing stock for the people in the Elf Village.
n_15: I don't really mind if people are talking about me behind my back...
f_16:
But I do.
On top of the impure bloodline issue...
...my youngest daughter is cheerfully going out every day to get violated by monsters.
n_17: I'll do better...next time.
f_18: Sigh...I don't know where you get your stubbornness from.
Well, keep up the 'good' work until you realize what you're getting yourself into.

n_00: <think>Let's just go home and rest for the day.

v_00: I'd like to make the path between our shop and the elf village a little safer to traverse.
n_01: Don't you already spray it with herbicides to keep mana plants from growing?
v_02: Yes, with some help from the guards. It doesn't seem to be enough to keep the monsters away though...
Which reminds me, have they done anything about that big one yet?
n_03: No, I don't think it's been dealt with.
n_04: No, it's still lurking around somewhere.
v_05:
Hmm, I see~
Our store has the thrills and the monster provides the chills! Sounds kinda cool, but...
It's not fun if the danger is life-threatening. I'd like to keep it at a moderate level, like with choke play.
n_06: Isn't that still pretty dangerous...?

f_01: Sigh...that furry teacher of yours told me the procedures for your return to school have been complete.
As are the preparations for your spell devices.
n_02: Ms. Primula said that? Then...does this mean I can go to school tomorrow?
f_03: Yes. It's been already two weeks, hasn't it? Since you were ripped to shreds and bedridden from that 'attack'.
f_05: Tell me honestly, do you think being enrolled as a cadet at Bermit is really what's best for you?
n_06: ...What do you mean?
f_07: Sigh...do I have to spell it out? It's about whether you have any talent for combat at all.
f_09: You participated in battle when the academy was under attack two weeks ago.
Your staff and uniform were completely destroyed, and the monsters drained all your mana.
For awhile they didn't think you'd ever be able to cast spells again.
n_10: That's true...but, I was able to cast White Arrow a few times earlier. I didn't even feel any pain.
So, to some extent, I'm already recoveri─
f_11: That doesn't matter. Now listen up. The Cornehl family was expelled from the village...
...yet our youngest daughter, a half-elf, has better magic skills than the pure-blood elves at the academy.
Do you know what that means?
n_12: U-um...
f_13: It means we're a huge target for jealousy.
Your defeat turned our entire family into a laughing stock for the people in the Elf Village.
n_14: I don't really mind if people are talking about me behind my back...
f_15: But I do. On top of the impure bloodline issue, we're also running a shady brothel-like business to attract customers.
We have enough problems with people starting rumors about us, so I don't want to see you adding fuel to the fire.
n_16: ...I will be careful.
f_17: Sigh...How did you grow up to be such a troublemaker?

v_00: Noel, welcome back~ ...Ah, what happened? That's a rather lewd look for you.
n_01: Sister, p-please forgive my shameful appearance...
v_02: There's nothing shameful about your beautiful body and porcelain skin. I'm grateful for the opportunity to admire you like this.
n_03: I'm not dressed like this on purpose! Monsters attacked me while I was gathering materials...!
v_04: Ah, is that so.
v_04_2: Monster semen and eggs are miraculous alchemical ingredients. The only problem is they are difficult to collect and spoil easily.
I know, the next time you get covered in monster fluid, come back quickly so I can collect it.
n_05:
...I'll pass.
Anyway, here are the materials you asked for.
v_06: Wow, good work!
Even after being ravaged by the monsters' big black thing, you still came through for me.
n_07: Please stop!

v_00: Noel, welcome home~
n_01: I'm back, sister.
v_02:
Hmm~, as expected of my beloved sister~
You've collected everything I asked for~
v_03: Oh! You mined some ores for me too! Such a model student! Thank you so much for your help~
n_04: Well, it's not like you asked for much...
v_05: I was afraid your delicate arms would break from the weight of the materials.
I'm glad you made it back safely.
n_06: ...Thank you.
v_07: These materials look good, now if only I could obtain that...

w_00: First time I've been called down from the mountain in a while, and it's to clean up this awful mess.
Requests from upper Grazia are always somethin’, aren’t they.
w_01:
You a student, lass?
Ah, right, this is a school route, isn't it?
w_01b: Well, sorry, but the road's closed.
w_01c:
...Hm? You wanna help?
Well then, I'd 'preciate it if you could check up on muh bud.
w_01d: That idjit always spends too much time on his safety checks before he actually starts blasting.
He's probably hangin' ‘round nearby, lettin’ the grass grow under his feet.
w_01e: If he’s not payin’ attention though, a mana plant might spring up and knock ‘im on his ass! <m scary>GAHAHAHA!
w_02: Oh by the by, don’t be castin’ spells near me. That magic stuff’s a wee bit toxic for us mountain-folk.
w_02b: Shouldn’t be any reason fer ya to anyway, the officers are doing everything they can to keep the mana plants from sproutin’ up here.
Whatta tough job that must be.
w_03: My buddy should be hangin' ‘round here somewhere.
w_03b: If you find him, tell him Walross is fixin' to kick his ass.
w_04: What's up with your clothes, lass? You tryin' to seduce me or somethin'?
w_04b: Sorry, but I'm only interested in my own kind. In fact, right now I'm thinkin' 'bout how to hit on that cutie I met back at the bar.
w_04c: Course, my wife would tan my hide if she ever found out. <m scary>GAHAHA!
w_04d: ...Oh, not sayin' yer ugly or nothin'.

I'm sure you could have any man you wanted no matter how you dressed.
Just don't let 'em take advantage of you.

v_00: Just once, I'd like to be able to visit the elf village.
n_01: You can see it from here when the fog is thin.
v_02: Ah, yes~ and what a sight it is to behold. A floating city above the forest!
v_03: Unfortunately, we are the exiled Cornehl family...boo-hoo~
n_03: Yeah, only our father and big brother Zeth are allowed in...
v_04: I wish I were as smart as Zeth. He had the top score for his entrance exam!
With a title and aura like his, I could waltz right past the gatekeeper.
n_05: I-I think you're great as you are! The village people may not approve of you, but...
v_06: I know that! I'm cute and awesome~!
I'll play to my strengths and get into the village my own way.
Maybe I could find a distinguished elven gentlemen to be my sugar daddy or something?
n_07: Is being promiscuous really enough to get by on...?

x_10: Did you know female elves are far and away the best when it comes to casting spells?
I can't even lift my head up to look such strong women in the eye. I'll never be on their level.
n_11: If that's the case, shouldn't you work harder to try to score points with them?
x_12: Exhibiting poor effort is worse than doing nothing at all.
Even if they're motivated, it'd be better if such an incompetent person just stopped existing. That's the basics of the basics, y'know?
n_12: <think>He's not budging...this guy really is useless.

p_04: Alice was beginning to get very tired of sitting by her sister on the bank, and of having nothing to do: once or twice she had peeped into the book her sister was reading,
but it had no pictures or conversations in it, 'and what is the use of a book,' thought Alice 'without pictures or conversations?'
p_05: So she was considering in her own mind as well as she could, for the hot day made her feel very sleepy and stupid, whether the pleasure of making a daisy-chain would be worth the trouble of getting up and picking the daisies─
when suddenly a White Rabbit with pink eyes ran close by her.
p_06: There was nothing so very remarkable in that; nor did Alice think it so very much out of the way to hear the Rabbit say to itself, “Oh dear! Oh dear! I shall be late!” but when the Rabbit actually took a watch out of its waistcoat-pocket, and looked at it, and then hurried on─

Alice started to her feet, for it flashed across her mind that she had never before seen a rabbit with either a waistcoat-pocket, or a watch to take out of it, and burning with curiosity, she ran across the field after it,
and fortunately was just in time to see it pop down a large rabbit-hole under the hedge.
p_07: However, this bottle was not marked “poison,” so Alice ventured to taste it, and finding it very nice, (it had, in fact, a sort of mixed flavour of cherry-tart, custard, pine-apple, roast turkey, toffee, and hot buttered toast,) she very soon finished it off.
And so it was indeed: she was now only ten inches high, and her face brightened up at the thought that she was now the right size for going through the little door into that lovely garden.
p_08: “He took me for his housemaid,” she said to herself as she ran. “How surprised he’ll be when he finds out who I am! But I’d better take him his fan and gloves—that is, if I can find them.”

As she said this, she came upon a neat little house, on the door of which was a bright brass plate with the name
“W. RABBIT,” engraved upon it. She went in without knocking, and hurried upstairs.
p_09: “It was much pleasanter at home,” thought poor Alice, “when one wasn’t always growing larger and smaller, and being ordered about by mice and rabbits. I almost wish I hadn’t gone down that rabbit-hole—and yet—and yet—it’s rather curious, you know, this sort of life!

I do wonder what can have happened to me! When I used to read fairy-tales, I fancied that kind of thing never happened, and now here I am in the middle of one! There ought to be a book written about me, that there ought! And when I grow up, I’ll write one—but I’m grown up now,”
She added in a sorrowful tone; “at least there’s no room to grow up any more here.”
p_09_2: “Off with her head!” the Queen shouted at the top of her voice. Nobody moved.
“Who cares for you?” said Alice, who had grown to her full size by this time. “You’re nothing but a pack of cards!”
At this the whole pack rose up into the air, and came flying down upon her: she gave a little scream, half of fright and half of anger, and tried to beat them off─
And found herself lying on the bank, with her head in the lap of her sister, who was gently brushing away some dead leaves that had fluttered down from the trees upon her face.

“Wake up, Alice dear!” said her sister;
“Why, what a long sleep you’ve had!”

“Oh, I’ve had such a curious dream!” said Alice, and she told her sister, as well as she could remember them, all these strange Adventures of hers that you have just been reading about; and when she had finished, her sister kissed her.
And said, “It was a curious dream, dear, certainly: but now run in to your tea; it’s getting late.”
So Alice got up and ran off, thinking while she ran, as well she might, what a wonderful dream it had been.
n_11: Is this really a history book? The story feels a bit extraordinary...
p_12: Yeah...maybe it's just something for adults to read to their children.
p_12_2: But, it's astonishing how imaginative people were in the past too, right?
n_13: The ”Rabbits” and ”Cats” that appeared midway in the story...are they like Dwarfs?
p_14:
No, I don't think so. It's true that Dwarfs are a race that dwell in the depths of
the earth...
...but if anything, these little animals are more akin to the ancestors of us beastmen.
n_15: Ancestors....
p_16: It's rare to find traces of our ancestral life from exploratory digs.
One thing we do know for certain is the domestic animal called ”Cat” was one of the closest companions to people of the past.
p_16_2: I remember your grandmother saying that she had "Cat's blood" in her veins.
So, the ears on your head may also be of a Cat's origin; inherited from your grandmother.
n_17: ...I hate these ears. It tickles when my hat or hair rubs against them.
Nobody else in my family or at school has them either. It makes me feel like I don't belong─

-through a process called 'reincarnation' at the 'Heavenly Facilities'.

p_23: There are rumors that a very small handful of powerful people have access to the top level hidden in Grazia's Heavenly Facilities.
If the 'CRADLE' in this doctrine really exists...
I'm sure I'll be able to see the stars with my own eyes from there.

p_26: ...Well, I'm off for today. I'll see you tomorrow evening after I finish my work at school.

b00:
“Ouch...”
　Noel lightly pressed her swollen skin.
　She had been attacked by monsters and sustained multiple injuries, leaving her barely able to stand.
　Her thin limbs were covered in bluish-black bruises and open wounds oozing blood. They throbbed with immense pain - as if to convey the horrors of the battle.

As Noel fought back the pain, her thoughts turned to the image of the monster's huge black body closing in on her.
She gulped in fear.
“If the attack had lasted much longer, I would've─”
　It brought back memories of the monster horde draining every last drop of her mana.

Such agony. Where she was left too weak to even cry out for help.
(I don't want to go through such a painful experience again.)

──
After treating her wounds, her fear began to subside.
“It's okay, I can do this─”

(The youngest and proudest daughter of the Cornehl family, and the most talented girl in the school...
I don't think I deserve to be referred to as such, but I guess I can at least pretend to have the self-confidence for it.)
The staff shimmered a faint jade color, as if in response to Noel's heart.

p_04: Very well. Then I'll use the same spell again.
p_05: I understand. In deference to your eagerness, we'll move on to the next skill.
p_06: After the shield has been kept up for some time, it will glow red.
If an enemy's attack hits the shield while it's red, the shield will be destroyed.
When that happens, you will be knocked down and defenseless for a while, so be extra careful.

v_00: When you defeat a group of monsters, you'll be rewarded with a treasure chest of materials. You don't have to open it right away.
n_01: So...just hold on to it?
v_02: Of course, they'll take up space in your inventory, so you can't have an unlimited number of them.
Also, since you can't use the items inside until you open them, having too many will make exploring tricky~.
v_03: Also also, <c blue>the item quality is affected by the danger level when you open the chest<c>, not when you obtain it.
Which means...fufufu~
v_04: If you get some chests and knock out a few monsters first...
n_05: I'll get higher quality items...?
v_06: Correct! Delay your gratification and let it build up first. That always feels best~!
n_07: Ooh, so I could store a lot of chests at home, then take them with me and increase the danger level...!
v_08:
Ah~ afraid it doesn't work that way.
When you return home all chests will automatically be opened.
The same happens if you faint, but <c red>the danger level resets to zero first<c>.
v_09: Other items in your bag won't be lost when you faint, so it might be wise to open the chests if you think you won't make it~.

n_00: There's a lot of small, magic-resistant monsters here...attacking them is useless.
n_01: They're all over the ceiling, too...I'll have to be careful to not jump into them.
n_02: If I need extra hang time or distance after jumping, I can <c blue>dodge in mid-air<c>.

i_00:
Uwah...my...ma...na...
it’s draining...
i_01: Ahh, hah, huah...
i_02: Stop...no more...
i_03:
I thought you were
done for...! Attack!
i_04:
How did you...!
It’s vulnerable...!
i_05:
Now’s your chance,
Noel Cornehl!
i_06: KYAAAAA!
i_08: NO MORE, NOOO...!

n_00: I ran into a monster on the way...and, well...
p_00: Could it be...you were defeated?
n_01: Um...yeah, but...it released me before things became serious, and I didn't lose too much mana...
p_02: That must have been scary. Here, have some warm tea.
It'll help with any gluttocruorin loss and restore some of your mana.
n_03: ...I-it's...h-hic...delicious...
p_04: There, there. You're back safe and sound, that's all that matters.
You did well.
p_05: How are you feeling? Still in any pain?
n_06: Hic...no, I'm okay now.
p_07: Is it alright if I examine you a bit just to be sure? Show me your chest.
p_08: Your heartbeat is...a little erratic, but still in the normal range.
And...while not serious, there are symptoms of level three gluttocruorin loss...
p_09: Let's have a sit-down session until the medicinal properties of the tea take effect.
n_10: Okay...let's go back to my room. Will it be physics today? Or maybe math?
p_11: No, we'll stay here... Tada!

p_00: Mm...hup.
p_01: I'm going to cast a spell at you, please try to block it.
n_02: Okay...!
p_03: We'll start with practice drills for shields.
<key lsh/><c red>While your shield is active, you can protect yourself from toxic gases.
p_04: Keep the shield up so you don't inhale the gas from my spell. Let's begin!

p_01: Are you all right? You inhaled a lot of gas and fainted.
n_02: I-I'm sorry. I'll do better next time...
p_03: If you put up your shield for a long time, it will glow red and its strength will drop.
But, <c red>as long as you do not receive physical damage, it will not break<c>. So, you can keep the shield up until the gas dissipates.
p_04: ...Okay then, once again! This time, be careful not to breathe in the gas!

n_00: What am I fighting for...
n_01: When I was little, my sister and I were playing in the forest. I had gotten bored with our usual route...
She tried to stop me, but I persuaded her to follow me deeper into the forest.
n_02: There, I thoughtlessly picked a mana plant, and a group of monsters attacked...
n_03: I was too scared to even stand up, but my sister was so quick with her spells.
She wiped out the entire pack.
n_04: It was so cool...
That's why I must become stronger. So I can make this world a better place...
n_05: ─! No... Stay back... <m scary>Someone... No...!

n_00: I ran into some monsters on the way, but I managed to defeat them.
p_01:
<m ple>You fought!?
<m>You promised you wouldn't go anywhere dangerous!
n_02: I-I'm sorry...there was one monster on the way back, and it didn't look like I could get around it.
p_03: ...You are an excellent student, but there's still the matter of what happened two weeks ago.
That's why I'm checking on you today, to judge if you can use magic normally. Are you in any pain?
n_04: I'm all right; I didn't feel any pain even when I charged the staff with my mana.
p_05: I still need to examine you, just in case. Show me your chest.
n_06: O-ok...give me a moment.
p_07: Your heartbeat...is normal. There doesn't seem to be any magic mass buildups in your body. Try taking a deep breath.
p_09: That's good enough. Thank you, Noel.
n_10:
Thank you, sensei.
...Oh, by the way, Ixia told me she gave you a spell.
p_11:
Ah, yes, she did.
But before we get to the practical training─
Let's get some classroom matters out of the way. I actually have something special for you today─
p_12:
<m ple>Tada!
We're going to study history with this!

x_00: Y-You're shopping here too...? Hehe, you're a bad girl.
n_01: Bad girl?
x_02: There's a rumor that this shop is run by the witch who got expelled from the village.
Mom and Dad would scold me if they knew I was coming here. So I woke up early to get here in secret.
The path here is scary isn't it? There's a bridge almost overtaken by thorny plants and a place filled with mushrooms...
And have you heard the story that someone saw a ghost disappearing into the earth near here?
n_03: So our house is a source of urban legends...
n_04: ...Although, I did feel some sort of presence yesterday.
x_04: Then it's true! I-If I buy a talisman here, will the ghost get mad and show itself?
n_05: Aren't talismans meant to keep ghosts away...?

<device>SOS signal received.
SOS signal received.
Estimated bearing:
101.78 / -0.045
Distance: 2.39
n_01:
Again!?
And it’s really close, too...
Could it be...?
n_02: I have to check up on Ixia...!

n_04: <m ple>What!? But then, what will happen to Ixia!?
ixiacane_05: <device><noise>A survivor? Calm down. Report the situation to me.
n_06: ...I-I am Noel Cornehl. Level III Cadet of Bermit Academy.
I think...one of my friends has been captured by the monster!
ixiacane_07:
<device><noise>...You need to get out of there.
<device><noise>Even though it’s wounded, it's still too much for a cadet to handle.

<device><noise>Get as far away
as you can before
it’s too late──
ixiacane_08: <device><noise level="2">You’re breaking up... Can you still hear me? Respond──
n_09: <m fadein>Is the military really going to just leave Ixia to die...?
n_09b: <m fadein>I have to get to the monster before they do...
<m fadein>...but...can someone like me...really save her?
<m fadein>...Am I going to end up like I did on that day...
n_10: <m fadein>...
n_11: No, I can...I WILL SAVE HER!

n_00: Do you have any tips on gathering materials?
v_01: Oho~, are you going to gather materials for me again? <m joy>You're such a good girl, Noel!<m> *pat* *pat*
n_02: Wah, there are customers here...
v_03: By now you probably know that most spots where you can get materials will be replenished after you return home.
But, did you know you're more likely to find <c red>higher quality materials<c> when the <c blue>danger level<c> is also high~?
n_04: Danger...
v_05: Yep. As you defeat individual monsters, their scattered mana will start to build up...
...and once you finally finish the whole group...
v_06: <m joy>SPLURT~<m> their pent up mana will gush forth, increasing the danger level and improving the quality of nearby materials~!
n_06: Y-You don't need to use such an obscene analogy every time...
v_07: You're so naive~

n_00: I want to try cooking!
d_01: No.
n_02: Why nooooot!
d_03: Because this is my kitchen, my ingredients from the garden, and my good seasonings. I am deeply attached to them.
Got it? If you were to burn any of them you would no longer be a sister to me.
n_04: Uuu...
d_05: I do still have a stock of ingredients that I bought from town, but even those are off limits.
If you really want to try cooking, you'll have to gather your own ingredients.
n_06: Oh, I can do that! I'm good at gathering.
d_07: You can use the regular cookware, but don't even think about laying a finger on Josephine.
d_09: Isn't she cute? It's a pan of love, coated in the oils of countless meals. It took years to get her to this state...
n_10: <think>Now that I think about it, that's the same pan he's been using since he graduated...
d_11: Here, you can cook with this until you prove you're capable of handling something more advanced.
n_12: Wow, thank you so much! I'll take good care of it.
d_13: Let's start by having you cook the toast I mentioned earlier.
I'll provide the ingredients for today, but after this you'll have to use ones you've gathered yourself.
d_14: I'll let you use some of my ingredients, but I'm keeping the finished sandwich this time. Try not to mess it up.

d_00: Eating food will give you some pretty good buffs. Automatic HP recovery, or a huge increase in attack power for example.
So unless you're in heat and only stepping out to fool around with the monsters, you should eat before leaving.
n_01: As if that'd ever be the reason I go out!
d_02: The potency and duration of the buff is affected by the quality and quantity of ingredients used in each recipe.
Whenever you fight a monster, the buff's duration will decrease. It's a good idea to come home when the buff runs out and you're hungry again.
n_03: Can't you just pack me a lunch so I can eat outside?
d_04: Food spoils instantly when it comes in contact with mana fog. So unless you have a <c blue>special container<c>, you have to eat at home.
d_05: Our shop does sell them, but they're expensive. And you know what our sister's stance is on family discounts...
d_06: You'll have to work hard and save up if you want the luxury of eating on the go.

n_00: Is it true that large monsters have been showing up more frequently in this area?
t_01: <I><m scary>Nope! <m>None! There's definitely nothing like that going on!
n_02: But, the guard said there are eyewitness reports...
t_03: <I><m ple>If word gets out that those dangerous things are swarming all over the place, my business will be doomed!
t_04: <m ple>People pass through this forest on their way between the city and the village, so for me it's a nice marketplace with a lot of customers!
n_05: I think my friend might have been captured by the monsters. If you have any info, would you please tell me?
t_06: <m joy>...Don't look at me like that~.
t_07: The thought of the princess and her friend crying while in mortal danger is enough to give me nightmares...but I guess I have no choice.
t_07b: Okay, there's a massive cave-in near the drawbridge en route to the city...
Reported sightings of the large monster are spotty and disjointed, but I'm thinking that's probably its work.
t_09: Sounds unreal, right? The scholars in the village think "monsters are primitive organisms, with no capacity for intelligence",

but I disagree.
I saw them work systematically to protect the mana plants.
It's very possible that they sense the danger of being outnumbered by an army of elves and are hiding to wait out the storm.
n_10: Then, what if Ixia...my friend was captured?
t_11: ...She might be kept alive as a hostage.
n_12: ...I have to go save her.
t_13: <m ple>W-Wait! Judging by the scale of the cave-in, the monster is really big and powerful!
t_14: I probably shouldn't mention this, but worst-case scenario if you lose to that thing and the elven forces arrived late...
...at that point, saving just two cadets won't be the first thing on their minds...
n_15: They would prioritize the extermination of the large monster over saving our lives...to protect the city?
t_16: I'm just saying it's a possibility! I might be biased since I don't trust people from the village, but still, just in case!

So, princess,
make sure you are prepared for anything!
t_17: <m joy>If you purchase from Nightingale's Whimsical Shop now, I can offer you great items for 0% off the price!
t_19: It's one thing to make a sale, it's another thing to make a profit!

d_00: By now you should know that each ingredient can have various benefits when cooked and eaten.
n_01: If I cook and eat a lot of food with a variety of effects, will I become the strongest...?
d_02: That depends on your cooking skills. Just be careful not to eat too much.
If you try to eat a high value dish when you are already full, only a little will actually go down your stomach.
That means the potency of the dish will be greatly reduced.
n_03:
Can't I just store the leftovers?
Or maybe, combine them with other dishes...
d_04: ...Disgraceful. If I were father I'd disown you.
d_05: By the way, <c blue>the effect of all food eaten when you are hungry will be 1.5 times greater</c>.
Food tastes a lot better when you are hungry, after all.
Because of that, your first meal of the day should be a special one made with high-grade ingredients.

b20_2:
"Of course...I understand. Take your time.",
her sister replied.
After thoroughly washing her entire body, Noel returned.

b17_2:
Feeling a mixture of embarrassment and joy,
Noel closed her eyes.

b00:
「绝对不会输掉的、我一定会忍住的——」
诺艾儿拼命合上双腿，尽量移开注意力，
努力在脑海里想象老师和家人的样子。
可是，诺艾儿的秘唇像是想要什么似的
隐隐作痛，每次发作
思绪都会被淫乱的想像所覆盖。

…等到诺艾儿平静下来，
已经过了将近一小时了。

缠满媚毒和爱液的手指，不断发出
「咕啾咕啾」的淫靡水声，
一次又一次地引导诺艾儿走向高潮。
……不久之后，诺艾儿终于察觉到
自己的内裤已经褪下，双腿大开，
就这么昏倒在了长椅上。
「我，我竟然，在这种地方露出这个样子——」

一边红着脸慌乱地把脚伸过湿漉漉的内裤，
一边把身子缩起来。
想到自己这幅下流的样子，
要是被人看到的话——
诺艾儿的脸颊一时之间
被染得像一个熟透了的红苹果。
对放纵自己沉浸于快乐中的行为感到了后悔。
